chat_history.message:
Dear Backcare,

The customer's parcel has been at a pickup point since 17/05. Please ask the customer to pick up their parcel or it will be returned to us. Thank you.

Address: 
COPY COSMOS , 32 BESSUNGER STR. , DARMSTADT , 64285 , DE

Regards,
RK

Hello ecomobile,

The customer cancelled the purchase and asked for a refund as soon as they received the order back.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the customer's request. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer.

Regards,
SY
